com.matrix.factory

Interface MatrixFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMatrixFactory

    public interface MatrixFactory
    This interface defines the public methods that a Matrix factory must implement. Copyright (c) 2015 UCL Computer Science, UCL
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Graham Roberts

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends java.lang.Number>
      Matrix<T>      		 getInstance(java.lang.Class<? extends Matrix> matrixClass, int numberOfRows, int numberOfColumns)
      Create a matrix that is an instance of the same class as the parameter object, with the given matrix size.
      <T extends java.lang.Number>
      Matrix<T>      		 getInstance(java.lang.Class<? extends Matrix> matrixClass, T[][] contents)
      Create a matrix that is an instance of the same class as the parameter object, with the given content.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        <T extends java.lang.Number> Matrix<T> getInstance(java.lang.Class<? extends Matrix> matrixClass,
                                                   int numberOfRows,
                                                   int numberOfColumns)
                                            throws MatrixException
        Create a matrix that is an instance of the same class as the parameter object, with the given matrix size.
        Parameters:
        matrixClass - A class object used to determine the class of the matrix to instantiate
        numberOfRows - The number of rows in the new matrix.
        numberOfColumns - The number of columns in the new matrix.
        Returns:
        The new matrix.
        Throws:
        MatrixException - If the class is not recognised as one from which a matrix object can be created or if an attempt is made to create a matrix with an invalid size.

      • getInstance

        <T extends java.lang.Number> Matrix<T> getInstance(java.lang.Class<? extends Matrix> matrixClass,
                                                   T[][] contents)
                                            throws MatrixException
        Create a matrix that is an instance of the same class as the parameter object, with the given content. The matrix size is determined from the content provided.
        Parameters:
        matrixClass - A class object used to determine the class of the matrix to instantiate.
        contents - The contents of the new matrix.
        Returns:
        The new matrix.
        Throws:
        MatrixException - If the class is not recognised as one from which a matrix object can be created or if an attempt is made to create a matrix with an invalid size.
